Cube.name: Order item
Cube.description: Items purchased within each order made at Olist Store

Dimension.name: Shipping limit date
Dimension.description: The Seller shipping limit date for handling the order over to the logistic partner

Dimension.name: Status
Dimension.description: Reference to the order status (delivered, shipped, etc)

Dimension.name: Purchase date
Dimension.description: The Purchase timestamp

Dimension.name: Approved date
Dimension.description: Payment approval timestamp

Dimension.name: Delivered carrier date
Dimension.description: Order posting timestamp (when was handled to the logistic partner)

Dimension.name: Delivered customer date
Dimension.description: Actual order delivery date to the customer

Dimension.name: Estimated delivery date
Dimension.description: Estimated delivery date that was informed to customer at the purchase moment

Dimension.name: Customer first order status
Dimension.description: Reference to the order status (delivered, shipped, etc)

Dimension.name: Customer first order purchase date
Dimension.description: The Purchase timestamp

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All customer first order purchase dates
Hierarchy.name: By month

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All customer first order purchase dates
Hierarchy.name: By week

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All customer first order approved dates
Hierarchy.name: By month

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All customer first order approved dates
Hierarchy.name: By week

Dimension.name: Customer first order delivered carrier date
Dimension.description: Order posting timestamp (when was handled to the logistic partner)
Dimension.foreignKey: Customer first order delivered carrier date (FK)

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All customer first order delivered carrier dates
Hierarchy.name: By month

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All customer first order delivered carrier dates
Hierarchy.name: By week

Dimension.name: Customer first order delivered customer date
Dimension.description: Actual order delivery date to the customer

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All customer first order delivered customer dates
Hierarchy.name: By month

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All customer first order delivered customer dates
Hierarchy.name: By week

Dimension.description: Estimated delivery date that was informed to customer at the purchase moment

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All customer first order estimated delivery dates
Hierarchy.name: By month

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All customer first order estimated delivery dates
Hierarchy.name: By week

Dimension.name: Customer zip code
Dimension.description: First 5 digits of zip code

Dimension.name: Customer city
Dimension.description: City name

Dimension.name: Product category
Dimension.description: Root category of product

Dimension.name: Seller zip code
Dimension.description: First 5 digits of zip code

Dimension.name: Seller city
Dimension.description: City name

Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: The number of order items

Measure.name: # Orders
Measure.description: Number of distinct orders

Measure.name: Revenue
Measure.description: Revenue generated based on the price of the item

Measure.name: Freight value
Measure.description: The freight value of the item (if an order has more than one item the freight value is splitted between items)

Measure.name: # Sellers
Measure.description: The number of sellers

Measure.name: Avg. days since last order
Measure.description: Average number of days after the last order fulfillment by this seller

Measure.name: # Orders
Measure.description: Number of orders with at-least one item fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: Number of items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: # Deliveries
Measure.description: Number of orders (with at-least one item fulfilled by this seller) that were already delivered to the customer

Measure.name: # Customers
Measure.description: Number of customers with items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: Revenue (lifetime)
Measure.description: The lifetime revenue generated of items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: Total freight value
Measure.description: Total freight value of items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: Days since last order
Measure.description: Average number of days after the last order fulfillment by this seller

Measure.name: # Orders
Measure.description: Number of purchases made by this customer

Measure.description: Number of items purchased by this customer

Dimension.name: Category
Dimension.description: Root category of product

Measure.name: # Products
Measure.description: The number of products

Measure.name: # Orders
Measure.description: The number of orders containing this product

Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: The number of items referencing this product

Measure.name: # Customers
Measure.description: The number of customers that bought this product

Measure.name: Revenue (all time)
Measure.description: All time revenue generated by this product

Measure.name: Total freight value
Measure.description: Total freight value
